As Shelia completed the motion, she felt something, not regret, no, instead it was some sort of glee, though with how it twisted and intertwined with her lust it was hard to tell. Still, she continued with her command;

“Did I ask for your opinion? No. I said you would eat. Therefore you will. Now, let’s try this again. Open up my little piggy!”

Disappointingly, the girl didn’t respond, only staring blankly from the shock of what had just occurred, her mother, previously as gentle as could be, had brought her hand against her; why? Confused thoughts were floating through her head, some merely scared, while others grasped at straws such as, “Is it my fault? Should I just eat until I can’t move? Would that bring my mom back?”

For the moment, those questions would go unasked, and therefore unanswered, there were more important things about after all. Not to mention the needy looking one over by the food, the employee recording the spectacle on her phone with one hand, causing Shelia to smirk when she realized why the other was nowhere in sight. Calling out to her, she informed the woman;

“Hey, May! You know you could help out if you want. No need for you to watch from afar, why not join the fun?”

Blushing, the proprietor started walking closer, asking a worrying question, for Brooke, at least, “I’d love to, but should I get some more food? Or there are some unprepared items like cake batter if you’d prefer those?”

“Well, why didn’t you mention that before?” Shelia exasperatedly mentioned before continuing. “Still, that’d be great, could you go get a pitcher of it? After all, what better way is there for us to make sure she’s packed as full as we can get her?”

“Of course, I’ll be back in a moment.” She promised, teasing slightly before she went, “Do try to keep her conscious, though.”

Expectably, it only took a few minutes before Shelia’s new friend returned with a pitcher in hand. The container filled with the equivalent of over half a gallon of well-mixed cake batter, with some extra butter and sorts for good measure, of course. It showed itself to be satisfactory if Shelia’s smile meant anything, at least.

Following suit, the lip of the receptacle was pushed into Brooke’s mouth, forcing the greasy flow to pour down her throat. Sadly, it barely took a minute for her remaining capacity to be filled, announced by a short fit of choking before she passed out. The women were disappointed by this, not to mention distracted in Shelia’s case, the mother’s arm going slack as she was lost in thought, leading the remaining batter to drizzle onto the unconscious child.

As for just what the woman was thinking about, she was recalculating how long this project should be expected to take. Since, disappointingly enough, her earlier assumption of the girl’s capacity was a tad too optimistic, meaning it might take a bit longer, but then there was the introduction of May.

“You okay? You’ve been spaced out for a few minutes.”

“Oh!” Shelia startled, not realizing she’d been so deep in thought, “Sorry, I was just trying to think of how long it should take before we see some solid results, best I could think of was a month or two though.”

“That’d be nice, and not to sound rude, but predictions don’t really matter. As long as we keep fattening her, the result will be the same after all. So, what’s the use of possibly setting ourselves up for disappointment?”

“Well, I guess. What should we do now, though? I was planning on bringing her back, but it doesn’t look like she could make the trip without spewing all over the seats, even ignoring the result of when I was distracted.”

“In that case, why don’t we wait in the break room? There’s a television in there for when business is slower than usual if we need to waste some time.”

“Sure, we might as well see if we can get to know each other a bit too. We don’t know anything more about each other than our names, after all.”

Leaving the unconscious, blatantly abused toddler in her chair, the women walked off, happily chattering as they found more in common than just their guilty pleasures.

“I’m so glad you like your new room, dear. Now,” Shelia says as she picks up one of the room’s many cakes, “let’s see how long it takes you to grow into it, my piglet.”

Brooke, having climbed onto the bed to see how comfortable it was, now found that she was trapped, there was nowhere she could go to escape her mother. As soon as she’d reached the rear of the bed, Brooke noticed her mistake. It wasn’t merely her mother’s actions, not this time. Instead, it was the pair of handcuffs conveniently set atop a pillow, having been initially camouflaged through their pink color. At this point, there wasn’t anything the girl could do except tremble, terrified at what had begun to be known as an unavoidable experience, one that, for a reason presently unknown to the girl, she didn’t entirely hate. Instead, she was almost enjoying it, if only a little. In league with this small, somewhat unwelcome revelation, the tot almost failed to notice what her mother had done. Shelia had briskly closed the cuffs over the girl’s wrists, making sure that she wouldn’t be able to do anything other than eat, and the mother will so enjoy the repercussions.

Still, even with the conflicting feelings that Broke had about the whole experience, once she was overfilled with the room’s cakes, she wasn’t much able to resist in any meaningful way. Shelia didn’t care, only wanting to make sure her daughter ate all she could, though that doesn’t mean she paid no attention to the girl.

Soon, after she’d fed Brooke the first of the cakes, the perverse woman saw something quite promising on the girl’s face, a smile. It was small, almost enough to escape her notice, so she decided to try something. She placed one of her hands on the two-year-old’s stomach, rubbing the swollen area to see if there was any effect on the girl’s temperament. Slightly surprising Shelia, there was, the girl soon seemed to relax, even becoming more receptive to the feeding, and, the previously almost unnoticeable smile grew, spreading contently over her piglet’s face.

It didn’t take long for a similar, but much larger smile to end up on Shelia’s face, and who would question why? Unfortunately, for Shelia at least, she barely managed to get another cake into her piglet’s stomach before she started shifting, pathetic, half asleep attempts at freedom. The one in question was Abigail, the now three-year-old girl who had for whatever the reason developed quite the habit for throwing tantrums and loud ones at that. Now this wouldn’t be as much of a problem if the upsets were over understandable things, such as being ignored or left out, even if it was only that she didn’t get want she wanted, but no, as far as the rest of the family could tell there wasn’t any reason, so as would any, they were getting undeniably annoyed, and were notably determined to end them. 1543312.content:
While she thought, the Sister eventually decided her decision was obvious. There was no reason she couldn’t go to the mayor second, trying her hand at the eccentric’s aid first. Truly, why take assistance with strings attached when you could get the same without? Not that she was confident that Mr. Wilkinson would hand her a free lunch, Lucy kept hoping. But with that decision, the woman had another problem, how might she increase her chances of getting assistance?


One way to do that could be playing into his peculiarities, there were seven girls she could pick from after all. But which one would be best? A meeker one like Sophia? Or one of the more outgoing children like Brittany? No one knew that much about the man’s preferences, nor the man himself really, aside from his seeming love of youth at least, but that was beside the point. Still, that wasn’t to say it took horribly long for her to decide, choosing little Sophia. Even if the choice was partly because of her clothes being in a more favorable condition. With that finished, she went to the girls’ room, thinking that it may be where the four-year-old was.


Inconveniently, the little girl wasn’t, a couple of others, Camilla and Ella, were, but they, as seemed to be their norm, weren’t who was wanted. So, after a short, awkward bit of small talk, their caretaker left them to their business. Once she had, Lucy checked the yard, immediately perking up when she saw the timid toddler with her siblings, the trio huddled together while Sarah discussed her scheme for the day. So, interrupting the “So I’ll”s and the “Then you’ll”s, the matron butted in, looming over them.


“What are you thinking about doing this time? Should I start thinking of new ways to punish you?”


Sheepish, if not remorseful, the leader retorted, “N-Nothing,” followed by a quieter, “please don’t.”


Smiling a little at the girl’s refusal to look her in the eye, “Fine, but I need to take your sister with me for an errand.” Turning to the other, “Is that alright Sophia?”


“...okay.”


“Then come along, say goodbye to your sisters and we’ll get on our way. We wouldn’t want to miss the horse-bus.”


“O-okay... bye.” Waving slightly to her sisters as she went.


The other two were less concerned, each letting out a short “See ya, sis,” before going back to their conspiring.


With that, the four-year-old was brought inside for a moment, squirming a little in confusion as her mother redressed her, leaving her in a slightly faded, but still respectable dress. Now, looking the child over in her new attire, Lucy smiled, thinking there might be a hint of a chance of all this ending well. So, patting the toddler on the back for a small reassurance, the Sister walked both of them back outside, explaining as they looked for the vehicle.


“Well, Sophia, I assume you’d like to hear what’s going on?”


“Yes, Miss Lucy...”


“Alright then, you’ve noticed how the orphanage isn’t looking too good haven’t you?”


“Yeah.”


“We’re on the way to try and fix that, both of us are going to go see one of the wealthier residents of this city, and if all goes well, we’ll get some funding. Maybe even a home for some of you.”


At that, the shy girl was led to speak up, “D-do you not want us anymore? L-like our parents?”


“Oh!” Realizing that may have been a mistake, the caretaker desperately tried to soothe the girl, “I’m sorry, I didn’t mean it like that. It isn’t that I want you gone, not at all, but I just don’t believe the orphanage is the best place you could grow up in. I can’t raise all of you to your best with only my own ability.”


“Oh... are you trying to get some help for that then?”


“Yes, yes. Please don’t be too worried, I don’t want to say goodbye to any of you either.” Setting a hand on the child’s shoulder, she continued, “Now, let’s find an empty one, it wouldn’t be good to make Mr. Wilkinson wait, after all.”


From there, it was only another few minutes’ walk before they found their ride. Following a wave of her arm proving enough to tell the coachman to stop, they crossed the street, boarding the cab once they could. After that, and a short instruction from Lucy telling the driver to take them to Wilkinson’s, the pair rested, both worried in their silence, if for differing reasons.


Thankfully, it wasn’t too long before they reached their destination, only taking about half an hour for them to arrive. From there, after the Sister exchanged a few shillings for the ride, the pair made their way to the gate, announcing their purpose to the guard. When they had, and the man had gotten permission, the two went inside, though Sophia, left in awe by her surroundings, was half dragged behind her guardian.


The treatment didn’t end once they’d entered the building, rather, it only became more necessary. What with the gilded windows, elaborate furniture, and assorted servantry, there was little the child, or Lucy herself, could keep their eyes off. It didn’t help the pair’s focus when they were left in the sitting room, told that the master would see them shortly, once he’d finished his current business. As for what that was, the poor maid’s slight blush didn’t give any help to the caretaker’s imagination.


Left to themselves for a time, Sophia couldn’t hold back her amazement for any longer.


“It’s so... fancy here.” She exclaimed, having failed to think of a better word to describe their surroundings.


“Yes, it is, do you like it? All the decorations and people?”


“Yeah, it’s so pretty. The people are a little scary though.”


“Well then, if you get too scared, just stay near me okay? I’ll protect you.”


“Okay. Thank you, Miss Lucy.”


“Don’t worry your little head about it. Now, what did you think looked best?”


Following that, there was likely another ten minutes’ worth of conversation before Mr. Wilkinson returned, having finished whatever previous business that had occupied him, though, for whatever reason, he seemed to be a touch out of breath. Not to say Lucy cared, she had much more important things to bother with, the somewhat hefty man in front of her representing those goals, a few of the usual girls cuddling against him. Still, even before she could start, he greeted them.


“You have my apologies for the wait.” He started, finally sitting down across from them, “Now, do tell me what business has spurned your visit. When you requested a meeting, I do believe you mentioned a loan?”

15433121.content:
Now, Henry Wilkinson had benefited from this revolution of modern machinery in the most eloquent of ways. Placing more machines than men in his factories had quite an effect on his wealth, going from just a man with one factory to being one of the richest men in Great Britain. Many suitors had tried their hand in winning over the man; each woman that tried to reach into his deep pockets had come up dry. Henry wasn't one to dwell on the triviality that was love. Now power is what Henry always wanted; love was inconsequential for this businessman control was all he was need.ed.
The sister had nothing but love in her heart for the people she had .sworn to take care of. The church had almost abandoned these children and her crusade, causing her to just scrape by on her own. Which is why she had gone do Mr.Wilkinson in the first place. Sophia didn’t understand exactly why she was there, or why she was given the only good dress the orphanage had? Was this going to be her new father, did the sister not want to keep her anymore? There were so many questions that little Sophia had on her mind. She didn’t know what to make of any of it.
Though the sister told her to keep quiet and just look pretty as she hashed out some sort of deal with this man. Henry looked over at the girl that the sister had kindly brought with her, up and down he studies the young girl’s body making notes in his head what to improve on and what can be left alone. If there were more girls like this little one around the orphanage, then it would be easy for the sister to get the funding she desperately needed to acquire, not one to dally Henry began to deal with the sister. Always the sharp-witted one with a silver tongue, Henry got right down to business. Looking over the nun and the small child she had brought with her as a way to soften his heart, Henry knew this game too well and wasn’t one to give for nothing.

“Now let's get this show on the road, dear sister, as I have a board meeting in half an hour what is it pray to tell you would require of me?”

“Well, you see Mr.Wilkinson, I run a small orphanage for troubled girls, and we are severely underfunded.”

“Ah, I see, you think with my wealth, I would be able to help your little orphanage out and save these girls from the street; the questions are what will you do for me?” snapping his fingers, signalling some of his servants to get the tea and desserts ready.

“Well, umm, what can I do to make sure that we can count on your donations to the orphanage?”

The discussion of what will happen to the orphanage had been drawn out by both adults, something that Sophia herself wasn’t much to paying attention to as none of it interested her. Looking around, the various trinkets and pictures that Mr.Wilkinson had collected over the years were marvellous to look at.

“Oh my, you misunderstand my intentions Sister Lucy; I don't give away things for nothing."

Lucy didn't quite understand what the man meant. Confused by the suave attitude this oil tycoon had, with the jaunt of his steps a, smile reached across his faces reaching for some parchment and an inkwell. Henry always knew how to smell out a good deal and seeing that the poor sister in a pickle only made his job that much easier to do.—Scribbling it all down on the loose parchment, that smile never leaving his face. While he was hard at work with the plans, one of his most loyal maids had entered the room. Various cream puffs and cakes came in with her, a cart full of sweets was what she was pulling it was enough even to make the strong-willed Sister salivate a bit. Being the astute person, he was Henry could see this was going to be easier than he thought, before leaving the premise of them Mr.Wilkinson whispering something into the maids ear causing her to automatically blushed in the mere mention of it.

“Now then, I’m willing to loan my services and vast wealth to you and your band of misfits, Sister Lucy.”

“Wonderful, the children will quite enjoy your company and generosity.”

“Now, now let's not be coy, as we all known you have probably heard of my interests, if you want my wealth and help with your children then you must keep them in line and teach them that they are mine, body and soul.”

“ah, well I knew you were a brash man, I didn’t know you strayed this far from god if I do commit to this act what is needed of me?”

The sister was quite afraid of the man’s answer, not knowing what was going to become of the children if she did accept his “generosity”. She didn’t have any much of choice, the church didn’t have the means or wants to help her with her endeavour, so this man was the last-ditch effort Lucy thought to save these girls from death.

“Oh nothing too ghastly Sister, my servants will be helping you in this so don’t you worry about the nitty-gritty. All you need to do is keep them in line; I like my future slaves nice and obedient.”

“S..slaves, what are you blathering on about, these are just children, Mr.Wilkinson what do you plan to do with them.”

“Oh don’t be such a daft woman, if you want my help to keep them off the streets then you're going to help mould them into being the perfect harem for me, you can start by forcing feeding that one on the couch all the sweets.”

“Your serious?”

“Of course, its this or they will be thrown on the streets so what is your choice, Sister Lucy.”

154331211.content:
Hearing that, and adding it to all the other stress she’s been shouldering, Lucy couldn’t help but finally break down. When the poor woman did, she wasn’t even given a chance to come to terms with what was now expected of her, a few tears even making their way down her cheeks. Since, crude as he’d show to be, Henry was nothing if not prone to kicking the hopeless, giving the Sister another glimpse at his malice.


“Well, do get on with it, there are only about ten more minutes before I have to move to another meeting, and I expect at least a portion to be gone before then. Understand?”


“I-I... yes, alright.” Came the half-stuttered, sniveling response of the step-mother, the woman trying to console herself that at least the girls would get fed, clothed, and loved in their now predictable futures. Even if not in the way she’d envisioned.


“Sophia... I’m... I’m sorry.” Was the only thing the distraught little girl heard before one of the pastries was pushed to her lips, its owner ignoring her pleas of “What are you doing? You’re scaring me.” and such as they pressed the dough into her open mouth.


“Just eat dear, or I’m going to make you. We need him to help you and the others, even if that’ll cost a few changes to yourselves.”


“Wha-” came the expected, unnecessary response while the cream horn was forced inside her mouth, stifling the question.


“Shhh. Just eat, please, I’m hating this as much as you are.” Lucy half-muttered along, trying her best to just block out what she was doing, only focusing on repeating a cart to mouth sequence, ignoring any pleas for her to stop.


But as was obvious, the instigator of all of this was having their own fun, one hand moving along one of his young attendants, while he sat. That wasn’t to say Henry was silent though, talking with a nearby maid as his entertainment continued in the background. The topic wasn’t much, the maid merely being told that she would have free reign once he had left, allowing her to do whatever she pleased as long as the toddler got her fill, the more so the better. Though the tycoon still wanted more from the yet unwilling orphanage director, speaking up with his next demand.


“Stop that! Don’t do it in such a boring way, watch what you’re doing to such a precious little girl. And really, there’s a chance for a bonus if you show how much you enjoy it.”


Startling, the parent couldn’t help but parrot back, ”Enjoy it?”


“Yes, enjoy it, and do you really think you have time to repeat everything I say?” Came the snapped response, “You’ve already wasted a few minutes, so if you want my funding you better step it up in the time you have left.” Pausing a moment, he continued, “Oh, and it really doesn’t matter to me if you listen or not, your tot will get stuffed regardless, the only difference is whether I give you money. So don’t ruin this by trying to be the better person.”


Finally, Lucy began to understand how wrong the situation had gone, it wasn’t once the talk had started, no, it was as soon as she’d let herself be in the same room as this miscreant. Not that there was anything she could do about it now, no, the best she could hope to manage was to do as her oppressor demanded, even if the funds would only serve to allow her to do this again, more so for each additional girl. So, deafening herself to the hypocrisy, the nun forced a smile as she pushed the next cupcake into her distraught charge.

The girl, by this point, only felt a strange mix of confusion and betrayal. Sophia just couldn’t grasp, let alone come to terms with the fact that this was how the person she trusted most was treating her, was this why miss Lucy hadn’t been able to find her a family? Why her birth parents had abandoned her and her siblings? These were the only thoughts the toddler had as she cried, the tears moving down her face as her sobs were choked with dough. But those were worsened by the words the child heard next from the one she’d trusted most.


“You’re doing so well, don’t worry about a thing. I’m sure you’ll get used to it soon, though I can’t say if you’ll be able to keep up with the increasing portions.” Seeing the girl blanch, the Sister reassured them, “It’ll be fine though, I’ll make sure all of you get your fill.”


So, none too reassuringly patting the girl’s head, the woman continued to bring the baked goods to their mouth, forcing danish after éclair into the opening. Sophia’s shy self too overwhelmed to much resist the onslaught, dutifully munching away at what she was fed. Yet, the experience couldn’t last forever, and the four-year-old did get full after a point, again beginning to squirm around uselessly as the baked goods were ever pushed against her lips.

As for the food’s provider, he had already left the room, feeling sufficiently satisfied as he prepared himself to discuss a possible cooperation between his and a rival company, which, if successful, could increase revenue by a good thirty-percent. Thus, the maid, Annalynn, had free reign for the moment, only required to make sure the debatably unfortunate little girl was given the stuffing of her life, not to mention see if she could provide Ms. Lucy with enough food for all of their charges. They’d ultimately need stuffing as well if they were to ever reach Mr. Wilkinson’s expectations, distant as they might seem.

Thus, after a bit of thought toward how she wanted to go about it, the maid went beside the Sister and spoke up, adding a few orders to what her employer already had already decided.


“Well, do stop for a moment and listen, Mr. Wilkinson won’t be happy if you don’t after all.”

Looking at the girl, it was terrific for Sister Lucy to think that this girl was the head maid on such an illustrative position, Lucy couldn’t believe that it was right with what they say about Mr.Wilkinson liking younger girls. Looking at Annalynn the, girl couldn’t have been no older than twelve, yet she seemed to be loyal to the oil tycoon, almost subservient to the wants and needs of Mr.Wilkinson. Looming over Lucy, the proper maid was watching closely to the motions and actions that Lucy had taken toward Sophia. Annalynn was one for everything to be done to the letter, not one to deviate from what Henry wanted she made sure that everything and anything was accounted for even if that thing was a fussy toddler. Lucy couldn’t believe that this was his head maid; Annalynn was just so young to begin with. She couldn’t help but look into the girl’s eyes. Cold and calculative, there seemed to be no hint of remorse or guilt in what she was doing, just a grin upon her face when looking at Sophia—forced to ingest another tart by the sister’s hand, both Sophia nor Lucy knowing when this would stop. The sister’s heart begun to break with each dessert Annalynn made the .weak nun force Sophia to eat.

“Sister...Please stop. I’m so full,” the young four-year-old squeaked, holding back the tears from feeling betrayed by the one person she trusted the most.

“I’m so sorry, Sophia, but please just eat all you can; if you don’t, you, this maid will make you eat.”

“But why I’m just…hmmph” Sophia's words were cut short as a large slice of cheesecake was shoved down her throat.

The girls had already seen so much death and destruction in their lives that if Lucy could protect them from that unpleasantness and make the girls wealthy with a master that loves them, then that is what she would do, not without her watchful eye on Mr.Wilkinson. At the same time, she showed the nun what her new orders would be and the renovations that were going to be planned for the rundown orphanage.

“Come with me, Sister Lucy. We have much to discuss; they will tend to the master’s property while we talk.” Annalynn opening the door for the horrified woman.

Lucy still trying to process what she had just agreed to do to her wards, how will this affect them, and was she doing the right thing to give them over to this man and his other little employees? Annalynn seemed to have the most day to day things under control. Annalynn never really liked this part of her job, though, thinking back to the first time she became the head maid herself and having to sacrifice her sister for happiness. A sister who became the premise of what Henry had based his harem on. Reaching one of the many rooms that Mr.Wilkinson’s mansion held, Lucy was made to focus on the contract that was written up by the legal team under the supervision of Henry knowing exactly why a lonely nun would seek him out in the first place.

“I hope you have reviewed the contract that my master had created for you, as you can see the orphanage and all the renovations would be owned by you, sister Lucy along with the help of the maid service to take care of the girls.”

This lit up Lucy’s face thinking of all the children she could save with a clean and fully stocked orphanage. There were many things that she could do with a fully functional facility.

”though I wouldn’t be too happy about that miss Lucy as this is only the case if you agree to the terms, if not, then we will gain our investments in other ways.”

“I understand I will comply to the best of my ability I guess” Lucy was a little unsure of what this meant but signed nevertheless as no choice was going to be better than this.

“Good, now if you follow me to as its feeding time for my sister, I can explain your role in the orphanage now.”

“Uhh, okay, I guess.”

Annalynn grabbed one of the many food-filled carts while directing the stunned nun to follow her into another room, what Lucy saw only made her question her decision more as in this room was….

15433121111.content:
Well, honestly, Lucy had to admit that she couldn’t quite tell what it was in front of her, not at first. And with good reason, what with the room’s only occupant being nearly indistinguishable from a large, flesh-toned cushion. Truly, the Sister was having a bit of trouble grasping what it actually was until her companion called over to it.


“Hey Emma, it’s mealtime again. Ready?”


The responding “Gimme!” though immediate, was detracted from by the two unwieldy, wobbling hams the child called arms, themselves much too large for anyone to expect the girl fed herself. Hence the question, but it wasn’t as if it took too great an effort to find where that demand had come from, the charming, fleshy face only forcing the entering pair to look from a lower angle than straight ahead to find it. So, bringing them around to the child’s side, Annalynn introduced the two.


“Well, Lucy, this is my little, three-year-old sister Emma. And I want you to feed her, I need to get you as ready as we can before you leave, the master is expecting you to start feeding your girls as soon as you return after all.” Rubbing the enormous stomach beside them for a moment, the adolescent continued, “Don’t worry too much though, either I or another servant or two will be sent along to help you out. Not to mention make sure you’re doing your share.”


“Well, that was somewhat to be expected, I guess.” The Sister conceded, hoping a bit of curiosity may raise her mood, ”Do you sevantry enjoy having a hand in this as much as Mr. Wilkinson seems to?”


“Of course,” Was the chuckled reply, “who did you think made the masterpiece in front of you?”


“Y-you...”


“To my own sister? Yes, and despite how adorable she is now, whining like a baby bird whenever food is nearby, it was so much fun while she resisted.” Sighing a moment as her cheeks darkened, “Watching her when she’d try to waddle away was just so...”


“What?”


“It doesn’t matter, just get on with feeding her. Look at how hungry she is after all.” Annalynn reminded, making sure to remember to ask her master if she could have some bonding time with her sister again.


“I...” Lucy wavered, at least until she reminded herself of how this would be any worse than what she’d done under an hour earlier, “Alright, could you scoot the cart a mite bit closer then?


“There you are, now don’t leave my sister waiting any longer. You don’t need to force her, remember?”


“Yes, that does... help.” She admitted, grabbing the first of the pastries, a doughnut, and pressed the kobliha against the waiting toddler’s mouth. With Emma happily scarfing it down, if getting a touch of jelly on her face due to the desperate speed of her eating. Yet what made it awkward for Lucy wasn’t the plain action of feeding the child, no, rather, it was how simply happy the toddler looked as she ate krapfen after zeppole after bomboloni, struggling to keep from showing a smile of her own at the childish glee that the blob had plastered on her face. Still, her rational half tried its best to dispel her rapture, reminding her of what trauma the girl likely went through on her way to become such an adorable specimen, but even then, it seemed the woman was too focused on the present result to fully care about, if not simply register that uncomfortable notion.

And with that attention, the sister failed to notice that she’d sped up, if only lightly. Though that implicit enthusiasm didn’t go unnoticed by her supervisor, Annalynn couldn’t help growing a bit more optimistic toward the plan’s end. Knowing that all the church member needed to do was realize an appreciation of what the magnate set out to accomplish, and it would become so much easier to fulfill the man’s expectations. Perhaps he may even feel generous and let Lucy keep one of them for her own enjoyment, as a sort of a reward for developing a shared enthusiasm.

Still, that was but the future, and the present often showed itself to be much less gratifying. Case in point, Lucy had begun slowing down, nearly stopping her task once her hand grabbed air. Too shocked by the possibility that she’d already stuffed the top shelf into the mattress of a girl, even if little Emma held no less enthusiasm than before. As it was, the toddler in question had returned to whining for more food, her anchoring stomach nowhere near satisfied.


“Why’d you stop? You aren’t even close to being finished you know, can’t you hear how desperate she is?” Annalynn impatiently complained, irritated that the woman had had second thoughts.


“It’s just so much...”


“So much what? Look at Emma, she’s starving, shouldn’t you help?”


“Well,” Looking at the child in question’s desperate face, Lucy had trouble thinking of a good reason to refuse, “alright. I don’t have any reason to punish her after all.”


“Good. Now, get on with it then.”


With a look and a sigh, she did, resuming her conflicted effort to fill the child. Not that there was much more to say, what with Emma fulfilling expectations and eating anything that reached her mouth, and Lucy begrudgingly enabling that. Nor did it take much time, the remaining cakes and pastries disappearing even faster than before, even if more out of impatience toward the situation than enjoyment of it. Though that didn’t quite explain the idle massaging that one of the Sister’s hands could be seen doing, rubbing a small section of the mass in front of her as the other arm worked on filling it.

As for Annalynn, she was wondering what would be the best course of action to continue with. There was another cart for her sister to eat, one wasn’t enough anymore after all, but it was obvious that the woman feeding her was nearing apathy, retreating into herself to ignore the current situation. From that, the child was stuck with thinking of an alternative, since even with the task she’d been assigned, she wanted her share of fun from it. So, staring blankly ahead in thought, it wasn’t long until the girl was bothered, a simple, known question breaking her focus.


“Miss, I’ve finished feeding her.” It came, it’s speaker gesturing to the bare trolley as they continued, “Are we finished here then?”

1543312111111.content:
So, a short time later, if quite a while in actuality, the spectacle had finally finished. On that note, one, or possibly both of its involved parties seemed to have done the same in more than a single sense, but regardless, in the end, Emma was simply left there, betraying no one’s expectations. Still, Annalynn quietly left the room for a brief time after she’d satisfied herself, and a glance from the terribly interested Sister gave light that the great stomach’s dampness did not entirely consist of its own sweat. That wasn’t to say Lucy had any complaints about being left with Emma, rather the opposite, herself left in a way she long hadn’t been, not since she’d come of age those years ago at least. And never had it been so strong as it was currently, giving her little rational say in whether she moved closer to the room’s sole other inhabitant. Nor did she much think before beginning to thirstily squeeze as much of the exposed flesh as she could fit in her hands when she'd reached her, nearly drooling as she did.

By the time Annalynn returned, newly dressed in a more casual outfit than her earlier livery, Lucy had managed to focus every bit of her attention on the blob laid in front of her. So, for a moderate length of time, the twelve-year-old simply watched as she had before, though there was enough difference between the Sister’s desperate fondling and her earlier robotic feeding that the child was left well entertained. Enough so even, that the maid soon decided to see what effect some encouragement might have, moving behind her pupil to whisper a few honeyed words to their ears.


“Well, don’t hold back now, no one’s here to judge.” Or “That’s it, just think of how great it’ll be when you’ve gotten your children closer to this size. So much more youthful flesh to squeeze, play with, and enjoy with them in all the wrong ways.” And “Not to mention how they’ll look when they start shuffling through the halls, wobbling around while they can still move. And then how teaseable they’ll be once they can’t.” Along with all the other variations, the child had to admit, it was quite fun to work someone up, closer and closer toward a finish with nothing aside from her words and heated breaths, even if that individual was different than the usual one.


As anyone does, Lucy had a breaking point, one that, due to her mentioned years of abstinence, was lower than that of the average person. But when she'd finally reached it, then sunk down from her high, the caretaker wasn't given the relief one might expect from such restraints being removed, rather the opposite, a momentarily forgotten aspect crushing into her mind. It wasn’t anything unfamiliar, no, it was merely the Sister’s profession calling out to her, chastising her for her desired promiscuity, and plainly denouncing her recent acts, her sins. The poor woman, who used to genuinely think of herself as pious at heart, simply crumbled underneath that shame and guilt, failing to keep the tears from her eyes, and took no solace in the camouflage those that fell gave her lap. As for Annalynn, she only stared, watching the woman cling onto some belief of self-decency.


After that, when Lucy had calmed down to a sufficient point, Sister and servant pair went to collect Sophia, the caretaker left carrying the now comatose child out to a waiting carriage. Though as she did, the woman couldn’t help the twisted cocktail of anticipation and remorse that flashed across her face, pleasantly surprised by how much heavier the toddler proved to be. Not to say it was unforeseeable, with how swollen the girl’s midsection was, truly, it seemed almost possible to treat its taut surface as if that of a drum. Such conduct would be discouraged, of course, giving attention to the high likelihood that such contact would lead its contents to spew. On that note, the two caring for the unconscious four-year-old sent their praises to the coachman, who, though some grace of God, managed to drive the unwieldy vehicle with nary a shake or bump.


From there, after they had finished their ride to the orphanage, Lucy guided her supervisor around its property, though the pair did run into an interruption as they went through the yard. But even with that, Annalynn had nothing but a smile on her face when she saw the offending tot.


“Hey there! Who are you miss?” Came the enthusiastic greeting young Sarah exclaimed, curious as any child would be at a visitor.


“Well, hello sweetie, I’m Annalynn. And who might you be?"


"I'm Sarah." Came the answer, its speaker taking a moment to collect her breath from her recent running, soon continuing their questions, "What're you doing here then?"


"I’m going to be helping your miss Lucy keep this establishment running, and keep you and her together. But there'll be some changes while I make that happen. Okay?”


“Yeah, that's fine, I don’t want to leave miss Lucy. What’re those changes going to be though?”


“You’ll see in a bit, I wouldn’t want to ruin the surprise.” Was the refusal, before the girl decided there was no harm in an innocent hint, “But I will say this, try to work up an appetite, you wouldn’t want to miss out, would you?”


“Oh. Okay!” With that and nary a goodbye, the toddler ran off, going back to dragging her waiting sister along for their misadventures. Though, in her haste, she hadn’t even noticed how her other sibling looked, let alone what the visitor said next when they turned to their unseeming subordinate.


“Isn’t she precious? So much energy, she looks like she runs about like that quite a lot. She does, doesn’t she?”


“I... yes, she’s probably the most energetic of these girls. Why?”


“What 'why'? Are you saying I won’t catch you staring when her activities lead her to wobble and sweat along the halls? That you won’t hop over and give her a snack when she takes a moment to regain her breath?”


“I... No, I...” was the pathetic, mumbled response that came from the trapped woman, her face turned to the side in a pointless attempt to hide its coloring.


“I thought so. But really, it would be appreciated if you stopped with this virtuous pretext around me. Have you forgotten your earlier spectacle already?”


The mention of that incident did nothing to help Lucy’s confidence, leaving the caretaker speechless, simply blushing as she was accused. She couldn’t deny any of it after all. Still, the woman was only given a few moments to collect herself, Annalynn soon reminding her of her current task, they hadn’t finished the tour yet. So, as they resumed their journey around and through the establishment, the sister remembered something, though given what it involved it likely wouldn’t be any problem.


“Miss, what are we doing in regards to food? We don’t have much of it in our cupboards, there’s barely enough money to buy some of the old produce at the market each week.”


“Oh, yes, that slipped my mind. I forgot to inform you earlier, but there is a cart or two on the way with such supplies. It should arrive by evening and once it does, I’ll do my part in guiding you to cook more fattening dishes, the master doesn’t like waiting after all.”


“I see...” Lucy paused, wondering just what sort of dishes she’d be told to make, before moving on “Well, would you like to go meet the other girls? You’ll be living with them for a time, won’t you?”

Annalynn was always one for perfection and seeing the orphanage in such disrepair only made her smile; she knew that her intentions to make this place into the perfect haven for her master’s piglets was her top priority. The sister, on the other hand, was just mulling in her brain what atrocity she had just committed. However, she was a woman of the cloth that didn’t mean she wasn’t any less human than the other people around her, and seeing that mound of flesh that was this maid’s sister made poor Lucy lose herself. Annalynn, on the other hand, was still a precise and calculative as ever; she knew that the sister was pure at heart and was just laying in bed with the devil as a means to save these poor girls from the harsh truths of the world. However, this might be the sister’s intentions, that didn't excuse the fact that these girls will be defiled and corrupted by the lust of the maids and Annalynn’s own master. Just as it was for this Annalynn two years ago when begging for salvation from Mr.Wilkinson, offering her sister as a tribute, Lucy will feel the same kind of grief that the head maid had to endure herself. However, the girl had now been corrupted by Henry and her desires. That was neither here nor there at the moment. Her mission was to get this orphanage in proper working order and assess the children. Something that Annalynn reveled in. Looking around, Annalynn could see why the poor sister had sought out Mr.Wilkinson in the first place. The old wood creaked, moving with the slightest steps of anyone around. Though structurally it was sound that didn’t mean it was entirely in the hard condition being a hand-me-down of a hand-me-down didn’t help at all it, Annalynn wondered if it would be just better to knock it down and start from scratch or try to repair it? The architect and personal friend of Henry always did a great job when it came to the various investments of buildings and land.

“Miss Lucy, I would like to inspect the children me, and the other maids will get lunch ready for them as assessing their eating capabilities would be beneficial for us” Anna shooing the sister into the other room to round up all the kids.

“Yes, Miss, I will collect them then.”

“Very good off with you then.”

Lucy was quite unsure if she was doing the right thing for the children, but it wasn’t like she had much of choice, thank goodness the other children haven’t spoken with Sophie yet as that was a conversation she was dreading but something that she will have to get around to. Sophie was placed with the other maids in the kitchen as she was still working off the large meal that she was forced to eat while the sister her protector rounded up all the other girls, many things ran through her mind as she looked at all the various maids that had come to the orphanage. Sophie didn’t know what to make of them or what their roles were going to be all the girls wanted to do was rest and digest her meal. Watching five or six similarly dressed maids all different ages from six years old to fourteen, Sophia was quite amazed at these skills, nothing was made to waste when it came to their cooking skills. Many different smells had entered the stuffed girl’s nostrils she, making her queasy thanks to her previous sweet meal, Sophia hoped that she didn't have to partake in this meal as well. As uncomfortable as she was the fear of having to indulge in another meal was something that she was dreading, with these strangers making what looked like a banquet only heightened Sophia’s fears.

Lucy, on the other hand, had her own fears to come to terms with, knowing that this was the only way to save these girls from the harshness that was the outside world was with Mr.Wilkinson’s help that was something that wasn’t going to change, though she shouldn’t dwell on it too much as it would just make her go crazy when she asks questions of a question. Getting Sophia’s sister ready for lunch was the easiest thing to do, they both were the more mature of the girls if Lucy based that on the maturity of a four-year-old that is. The only person she was quite dreading in coming out of her room was Ella the girl was quite hard to control on her own but seeing as the girl was lost to sea for a few months after that tragedy it was only something that Lucy had to deal with.

Sighing finally she had barged in looking for Ella. Looking under beds, in closets, and other different kinds of hiding spots Lucy was quite tired of this game.

1543321.content:
A day or two before a daycare’s opening, its owner, George, was checking his e-mail for inquiries from those responding to any of the ads he posted in some of the stranger areas of the internet. Posted there if only because it was the one place George could hope to avoid a lawsuit, if not for his unfortunate habit, he would have had advertisements in a multitude of other places. The unpleasant habit he has is that since he thinks that toddlers are cuter when they’re waddling, he can’t help but overfeed them whenever they’re in his care, often without their consent.


When it first reared its head, he was a neighborhood babysitter filling in for whatever parents had plans that didn’t involve their offspring. It had all gone fine, at least until he screwed up, badly, he’d gotten intoxicated on a job, and the liquor, other than unsteadying his steps, loosened his thoughts enough for him to decide to stuff poor little Elise with all she could eat, which ended up being a majority of what was in the fridge. He was, fortunately, able to avoid jail time through an agreement he and the parents came to; he’d reimburse them in any way they wanted, then never speak to them again. The conditions were harsh but undoubtedly justified, and George wanted to put it all behind him, so after doing any chores he was told to do, he moved to another state where he wouldn’t have such a taboo attached to him.


Skip a few years into the future, and George has managed to get all of the needed credentials to have what he’d grown to want since the incident. A daycare, a place where he could fatten up all the little girls he wanted to, only needing to find understanding parents.


Returning back to the present, George saw that there were quite a few applications in his inbox, all from parents wanting their children to grow at least a little wider, checking through the attached pictures he decided on five girls he’d accept now and notified the other parents that he’d likely take more once he got used to the new job.


Those accepted were:


Violet: two-years-old, blond hair, Caucasian, thin;


Her mother has always wanted a docile little butterball to pamper and spoil, but because of Violet being a picky eater, she’s not exactly the easiest to fatten up, so her mother decided to send her to a professional.


Preferred end weight - none set.


Claire: three-year-old, auburn hair, pale Caucasian, thin;


A clumsy child with an unfortunate habit of knocking things over while bumbling through the house, her parents while they don’t hold it against her, they don’t really want it to continue, so, thinking that she’d be less active with some added weight, they’ve decided to send her here.


Preferred end weight – at least enough to deter movement.


Bella: two-year-old, black hair, oriental descent, chubby;


Though she isn’t too much of a bother, she still does enough of what’s expected of a girl her age that her parents are a bit exasperated, it doesn’t help that they’re irresponsible enough to prefer if she couldn't run around at all.


Preferred end weight – at least enough to impede movement.


Aurora: one-year-old, blond hair, Caucasian, chubby;


Though Aurora doesn’t currently care about fashion now, her mother knows she will eventually, and with the notable correlation between fashion standards and eating disorders such as anorexia, her mother wants to make sure that Aurora will never fall prey to them. What better way than making her too fat to lose any weight?


Preferred end weight – none set.


Anne: three-year-old, brown hair, Caucasian, thin;


An athletic girl who never wants to sit down, not even for meals, preferring to pace around the room while every so often getting a bite from her plate. Her parents, exasperated from their failed attempts in getting her to stay still, decided that her athleticism was the problem, so she’s being sent here to get rid of it.


Preferred end weight – at least enough to slow her down.


Now having gathered a rough estimate of how much feed he’d need, George grabbed his keys and wallet, then left for the supplier he'd found on a feederism site, not expecting any questions about the quantity...
1543321.title: Non-consensual nursing.

choices: It doesn't take long for the girls' treatment to show results.
15433211.content:
A few days later at the opening of his daycare, George met in person with each of the parents and gave them a more in-depth explanation about what he’d be doing to their children, afterward, a few of them asked if they could ever come help out with feeding either their own or any child. Once the others had discussed it, the understanding was that they were fine with anybody feeding their respective kids and that it might be more enjoyable to get personally involved in the process instead of having George to do it all by himself.


As soon as they’d all agreed to come by whenever they had a day off, George brought them inside to see if there were any obvious improvements he could make. Inside, the building looked a lot more clinical and a lot less welcoming, past the entranceway there was a room filled with gurneys arranged in orderly lines, each with a set of bindings and a corresponding pump next to them. Thinking now was as good a time as any, George decided to start, announcing such,


“Well since we’re here, we might as well hook them up. You can help if you want.”


Since the invitation proved popular, George picked up the rowdiest of the toddlers, Anne, then used her as an example for the parents to see how to strap their own children to one of the beds. Teaching the group how tight they can pull the restraints without cutting off the girls’ circulation and how to adjust the flow of each of the pumps. While each parent was binding their child, immersing the room in a short cacophony of childish resistance, the unfortunate toddlers had no inkling of what was going to happen to them. Nevertheless, the room quieted once the parents had secured the mouthpiece to each child’s face, now waiting expectantly as the mixture of lard and batter began to be pumped into each of their children.


Once the mixture reached the girls’ mouths, forcing its way into their stomachs, George led the parents to another room, this one an office, in order to get a better understanding of what they want. Inside the office’s waiting area, George chose one set of the parents to interview, leaving the rest to talk amongst themselves while waiting their turn. The first to be picked ended up being Claire’s, once in the more private area of the office they introduced themselves as Stan and Alia respectively, then started to give George a more detailed explanation for their choice to fatten their offspring. It seemed that little Claire was clumsy enough to be a danger to herself, regardless of how irritating she was to others, so the decision prompting her journey to imminent obesity was as much for her sake as theirs, though they couldn’t deny the thought that she’d be cuter with the extra pudge.


When he’d finished with Claire’s, George went through similar conversations with the rest of the parents, getting a better understanding of what each wants from this arrangement and making a list of any change he might make for each of the girls. Having finished all of the paperwork needed, George showed the parents out, telling them that they can choose whether to pick up their child or not. If they’re not picked up, then the girls will be fed through the night, with nary a break to digest nor a chance at escape. Seeing the cars drove off, George when back inside to the feeding area, checking each girl for how much room they had left by pressing lightly on each of their stomachs to feel for any give. Satisfied with each of the girls’ capacities, George decided to slightly increase the flow, pleasantly wondering how long it would be until the girls could be fed at full power…
15433211.title: On the first day of feedings.

choices: A week later, the new girls arrive.
154332111.content:
After around a week, some fighting it all the way, the girls had obviously put on some weight, pleasing, if not themselves, a majority of the adults they’ve been around the past few days. The previously most active ones had gained the most, caused by the combination of being fed more per their parents’ request and being essentially forced to sit around and do nothing more than absolutely necessary while at home. The others had neither resisted as much nor as long, having understood that regardless of what they wanted, it was happening and was seemingly going to continue to, at least until their parents got what they desired.


The polar opposite of their unfortunate children, the parents were near ecstatic, a few barely able to keep their hands off the tots’ growing pudge, but the consensus was simple, they wanted more, their children weren’t big enough, not yet. Though, how to change that? The parents thought, going through whatever options they might have thought up, looking for something useful, something simple. Once one of them had the thought, they were dumbfounded by its simplicity, leave them here, leave them at the place that’s entire purpose was to help them grow. Of course, they still had to ask,


“Is it fine to leave our kids here? And much would it accelerate their growth?” Violet’s mother, Lacy, asked, jumping at the chance to further quicken her daughter’s voyage into obesity.


George, slightly amused by the parent’s enthusiasm, needed no convincing, more than willing to help the parents get their children to the preferred size, “Answering your questions, yes, of course, it’s fine to leave your kids here. Besides, feeding them twenty-four-seven is undoubtedly going to make them all the heavier. Now, who of you want to leave their child with me?”


Again quickly discussing with each other, the parents soon came to a unanimous conclusion, they were all perfectly fine with leaving their children overnight. Not that it seemed very different from what was happening already, the only difference being that they saved some gas and groceries. With that in mind, George decided to exchange numbers with all of them, thinking it’d be more convenient than e-mail anyway. Once he finished adding the parents’ contact info, he decided to bring up another topic, since it seemed like it wouldn’t take terribly long; what’s to be done when the toddlers are too fat to move? It wasn’t as if he had any qualms about fattening the girls past that milestone, far from, it was only the problems of: how will they be moved, what if they end up too big to take back home, what should be done to feed them at their respective homes, etc.


Voicing such concerns to the parents, he asked,


“What are we doing once your children can’t move anymore? Will you be buying one of the feeding machines to keep them growing at home, or do you want some other arrangement?”


George could’ve sworn he saw some of the parents drooling at the thought of their toddler growing too large to even manage a waddle, not that he blamed them.


Eventually, Aurora’s mother, Mary, provided an answer, “I’m fine with that, but I have a couple of questions, how much do the feeding pumps cost, and will you give us the recipe you use for what you’ve been feeding our daughters?”


“Well, yes, but there isn’t much of a recipe, I’ve just been feeding them lard, originally mixed with some cake batter for flavor, but you can add whatever you want to it for taste. As for the pump’s price, is sixty dollars fine?”


“Of course, you obviously have to feed any other girls that end up in your care, and for what it is, sixty dollars is surprisingly cheap. I assume we can get the lard through you, or will you tell us where to buy it?”


“Yeah, it might be easier for you to get it yourselves…” Complying to their request, George writes down the address from which the parents can order the mixture that makes up the majority of their young piglets’ diets.


“Here.” He said, handing out the slips of paper he wrote the address on.


After giving each parent a copy and seeing them off, he goes back to what he’s being paid to do. Turning each of the girls’ pumps to the next level, then switching off the lights and going back to his office. Thinking that since he’d gotten a comfortable routine so there was no more reason to hold off, he decided to accept a few more customers. Going through his e-mail once again, George looked for any girls that piqued his interest…
